gsw_content_information.article:
Required

Activation of the Agent Chat plugin is required in order to access the page for this task.

Chat Setup is your hub to configure Workspace Agent Chat capabilities. You can enable the following capabilities to further enhance your users experience with Workspace Agent Chat.

  • Agent Settings control how agent names and avatars are displayed in the chat window.
  • Agent Whisper gives managers access to assist agents in customer conversations without the end user's knowledge.
  • Estimated Wait Time automatically informs customers of their place within the queue after a live agent transfer.
  • Transcript Download allows end users to download a copy of the conversation text from the web chat client.
  • Transfer Messages automatically inform customers that they are being transferred to another agent.
  • Dynamic Translation for Agent Chat (DTAC) automatically translates messages so that agents and end users can engage in conversations even in the absence of a common language. DTAC is automatically enabled when the Dynamic Translation for Agent Chat plugin is installed.
gsw_content_information.title: Chat Setup*
